record.description: Opening of the Lying-In Hospital's Premature Nursery at the University of Chicago. Left to right: Miss Mary Quinlan, Premature Nursery head nurse; Mrs. Lawrence A. Kimpton, Hospital Board member; Dr. M. Edward Davis, Lying-In Hospital's chief of staff; Mrs. Rosencrans Baldwin, Hospital board vice-president; Dr. F. Howell Wright, University of Chicago Department of Pediatrics chairman; and, Miss G. Phelps, student nurse.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Photo is pasted to a backboard with photographic information. Stamp: Please return to the University of Chicago Office of Press Relations
